data.name: Backpack Hero Demo
data.detailed_description:
The demo of Backpack Hero! Storm the dungeon in this unique dungeon-crawler!

If you're having fun - please add the game to your wishlist and follow us! The full game will go into Early Access in August and will include more items, more enemies, and new characters!
